entry.title: [FF] Last week, the Tim Dillon Show [had a very special guest](https://www.youtube.c
entry.content:
Last week, the Tim Dillon Show [had a very special guest](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5jpvUMaH17o).
As far as comedic value it's quite possibly one the worst episodes ever, but it's interesting as basically an introduction to Yarvin's ideas in a more palatable context than densely referenced blog posts.
